channel.title: CVE Feed for Collne Inc. -- Welcart e-Commerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Collne Inc. -- Welcart e-Commerce

item.title: CVE-2023-22705|2023-03-29T19:32:53.906Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Collne Inc. Welcart e-Commerce plugin <=Â 2.8.10 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-43614|2023-09-26T08:19:56.004Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Order Data Edit page of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-43484|2023-09-26T08:17:31.412Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Item List page of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-43493|2023-09-26T08:18:24.886Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Item List page of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a user with author or higher privilege to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-43610|2023-09-26T08:19:11.405Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Order Data Edit page of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a user with editor (without setting authority) or higher privilege to perform unintended database operations.

item.title: CVE-2023-41233|2023-09-26T08:15:39.579Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Item List page registration process of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-41962|2023-09-26T08:16:35.700Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Credit Card Payment Setup page of Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script in the page.

item.title: CVE-2023-40219|2023-09-26T08:13:16.447Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a user with editor or higher privilege to upload an arbitrary file to an unauthorized directory.

item.title: CVE-2023-40532|2023-09-26T08:14:17.836Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Welcart e-Commerce versions 2.7 to 2.8.21 allows a user with author or higher privilege to obtain partial information of the files on the web server.

item.title: CVE-2023-50847|2023-12-28T18:15:01.186Z -- collne%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Collne Inc. Welcart e-Commerce.This issue affects Welcart e-Commerce: from n/a through 2.9.3.
